project.description:
Description

  • This project will rebuild the Symbian^2 and Symbian^3 Platform from source using a Bill Of Materials that can either be downloaded from the kits page or from within the job itself.
  • It encapsulates the steps as defined in the manual build process for Helium and is a simple way to start building using the Foundation Build Framework.

    The Foundation Build Framework (FBF) is an Apache ANT-like configuration that can be used with the Helium tool, delivered in the PDT.

    Prerequisites

  • Installation of mandatory build tools

    Additional Information

    Source for the FBF can be downloaded from the following Mercurial Repositories -
  • FBF Configuration - https://developer.symbian.org/oss/FCL/interim/fbf/configs/default/
  • FBF Platform Project - https://developer.symbian.org/oss/FCL/interim/fbf/projects/platforms
  • FBF Bootstrap - https://developer.symbian.org/oss/FCL/interim/fbf/bootstrap

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: KIT_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Version of the kit to download. e.g. <li>2.0.2 <li>3.0.h

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DOWNLOAD_KIT
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: This will download the Bill of Materials (BOM), tools and prebuilt binaries from the web. Select if - <li>You havnt downloaded these archives already <li>You're not sure if you have the correct archives

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: SRC_LOCATION
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description:
How to get source for building the Platform -
  • BOM - download source direct from web using downloaded Bill Of Materials
  • ZIPFILES - unpack source zips such as src_oss_os.zip from specified location on disk

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: REBUILD_TOOLS
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description:
Tick this if you want to rebuild "TOOLS" target as well
  • Requires comercial VC++ 6.0 installed plus -
  • Requires binaries_epoc32_stlport.zip from release zipfiles

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: SPLIT_BUILD
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Is the baseline run in two distinct steps (GT+S60)? Tick this if - <li> Building older Symbian^2 PDKs. e.g. 2.0.d or earlier. <li> Building older Symbian^3 PDKs. e.g. 3.0.f or earlier

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: LOCALISATION
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Select whether to build more than one set of localised resources <li>engineering - just r01, results in quicker build <li>western - all defined language ids, build takes longer, but localised resources are created

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: HG_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter your symbian developer web username (required for any downloading of packages from BOM)

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: HG_PASSWORD
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description:
Enter your symbian developer web password (required for any downloading of packages from BOM)
Note: Please be aware that your password will be displayed in cleartext in the top of the console log

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TARGET
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Comma separated list of target(s) to build. Building armv5 targets requires RVCT arm compiler installed.

  • winscw_udeb.whatlog
  • winscw_udeb.whatlog, armv5_urel.whatlog
  • armv5.whatlog,winscw.whatlog

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: FBF_REV
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description:
The tagged version of the FBF (Helium) to use to build the Platform.
  • default - is the latest revision from the web

    Unless you want a specific revision, its recommended to use the 'default' revision of the FBF

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: @ECHO OFF IF "%DOWNLOAD_KIT%"=="false" EXIT 0 IF "%SRC_LOCATION%"=="BOM" SET DO_SRC_DOWNLOAD=--nosrc IF NOT EXIST C:\Symbian\utilities\.hg GOTO CLONE hg pull --update -R C:\Symbian\utilities GOTO DOWNLOADKIT :CLONE hg clone https://developer.symbian.org/oss/MCL/utilities/ C:\Symbian\utilities :DOWNLOADKIT mkdir %RELEASE_ZIP_LOCATION% cd /d %RELEASE_ZIP_LOCATION% @ECHO ON C:\Symbian\utilities\downloadkit\downloadkit.py --nounzip --nowinscw --noarmv5 --progress %DO_SRC_DOWNLOAD% %KIT_VERSION% --username=%HG_USERNAME% --password=%HG_PASSWORD% exit 0

%BUILD_DRIVE% cd\ rmdir /q/s sf-bootstrap mkdir sf-bootstrap cd sf-bootstrap hg clone http://developer.symbian.org/oss/FCL/interim/fbf/bootstrap cd bootstrap hlm -f bootstrap.xml -Dsf.project.repo=http://developer.symbian.org/oss/FCL/interim/fbf/projects/platforms -Dsf.config.repo=http://developer.symbian.org/oss/FCL/interim/fbf/configs/default -Dsf.target.dir=%BUILD_DRIVE%\maintools_%JOB_NAME%.%BUILD_NUMBER% -Dsf.config.rev=%FBF_REV% -Dsf.project.rev=%FBF_REV%

%BUILD_DRIVE% cd\ set HG_PASSWORD= set PROJECT=single set TOOLS_BASELINE_ENABLE=true set TOOLS_CONFIG=tools_rel.whatlog,tools2_rel.whatlog IF %SPLIT_BUILD% == true set PROJECT=split IF %REBUILD_TOOLS% == true set TOOLS_BASELINE_ENABLE=false IF %REBUILD_TOOLS% == false set TOOLS_CONFIG=tools2_rel.whatlog cd %BUILD_DRIVE%\maintools_%JOB_NAME%.%BUILD_NUMBER%\sf-config hlm sf-prep -Dbuild.drive=%SUBST_DRIVE% -Dsf.spec.job.number=%JOB_NAME%.%BUILD_NUMBER% -Dsf.spec.job.codeline="%SRC_LOCATION%" -Dsf.project.location=%BUILD_DRIVE%\maintools_%JOB_NAME%.%BUILD_NUMBER%\build\config\%PLATFORM%\%PROJECT% -Dsf.spec.splitbuild=%SPLIT_BUILD% -Dsf.spec.sbs.config="%TARGET%" -Dsf.spec.baseline.enable=%TOOLS_BASELINE_ENABLE% -Dsf.spec.sbs.tools.config="%TOOLS_CONFIG%" -Dsf.spec.job.rootdir=%BUILD_DRIVE% -Dsf.suppress.buildenv.check=true -Dsf.suppress.drive.space.check=true -Dsf.spec.logs.raptorfilter.enable=false

%SUBST_DRIVE% cd\ mkdir tmp copy %RELEASE_ZIP_LOCATION%\build_BOM.zip %SUBST_DRIVE%\tmp copy %RELEASE_ZIP_LOCATION%\binaries_epoc_additional.zip %SUBST_DRIVE%\tmp rem copy %RELEASE_ZIP_LOCATION%\binaries_bldmefirst.zip %SUBST_DRIVE%\tmp copy %RELEASE_ZIP_LOCATION%\*_rndonly*.zip %SUBST_DRIVE%\tmp copy %RELEASE_ZIP_LOCATION%\bin_redist*.zip %SUBST_DRIVE%\tmp IF %SRC_LOCATION% == BOM goto TOOLSZIP copy %RELEASE_ZIP_LOCATION%\src_*.zip %SUBST_DRIVE%\tmp :TOOLSZIP IF %REBUILD_TOOLS% == true goto UNZIP copy %RELEASE_ZIP_LOCATION%\binaries_epoc32_stlport.zip %SUBST_DRIVE%\tmp copy %RELEASE_ZIP_LOCATION%\tools_*.zip %SUBST_DRIVE%\tmp :UNZIP %SUBST_DRIVE% cd %SUBST_DRIVE%\tmp 7z x *.zip -o.. -y cd.. 7z x *.zip -y del *.zip exit 0

IF NOT %SRC_LOCATION% == BOM exit %SUBST_DRIVE% cd \ @ECHO OFF IF NOT "%HG_USERNAME%" == "" GOTO USERNAME_OK echo "You must enter a UserName and Password when using the BOM option" exit 1 :USERNAME_OK IF NOT "%HG_PASSWORD%" == "" GOTO HG_OK echo "You must enter a UserName and Password when using the BOM option" exit 1 :HG_OK cd \tmp hg clone http://developer.symbian.org/oss/MCL/utilities cd\ \tmp\utilities\clone_packages\clone_all_packages.pl -packagelist \build_info\logs\BOM\build-info.xml -username %HG_USERNAME% -password %HG_PASSWORD% -retries=7

%BUILD_DRIVE% cd\ set HG_PASSWORD= set PROJECT=single set TOOLS_BASELINE_ENABLE=true set TOOLS_CONFIG=tools_rel.whatlog,tools2_rel.whatlog IF %SPLIT_BUILD% == true set PROJECT=split IF %REBUILD_TOOLS% == true set TOOLS_BASELINE_ENABLE=false IF %REBUILD_TOOLS% == false set TOOLS_CONFIG=tools2_rel.whatlog cd %BUILD_DRIVE%\maintools_%JOB_NAME%.%BUILD_NUMBER%\sf-config hlm sf-build-noprep -Dbuild.drive=%SUBST_DRIVE% -Dsf.spec.job.number=%JOB_NAME%.%BUILD_NUMBER% -Dsf.spec.job.codeline="%SRC_LOCATION%" -Dsf.project.location=%BUILD_DRIVE%\maintools_%JOB_NAME%.%BUILD_NUMBER%\build\config\%PLATFORM%\%PROJECT% -Dsf.spec.splitbuild=%SPLIT_BUILD% -Dsf.spec.sbs.config="%TARGET%" -Dsf.spec.baseline.enable=%TOOLS_BASELINE_ENABLE% -Dsf.spec.sbs.tools.config="%TOOLS_CONFIG%" -Dsf.spec.job.rootdir=%BUILD_DRIVE% -Dsf.suppress.buildenv.check=true -Dsf.suppress.drive.space.check=true -Dsf.spec.logs.raptorfilter.enable=false -Dsf.spec.publish.enable=false -Dsf.spec.package.bin.enable=false -Dsf.spec.test.sendpkg.enable=false -Dskip.sbs.layer.generation=true
